block: Malignant neoplasms, stated or presumed to be primary, of lymphoid, haematopoietic and related tissue
title: Chronic myeloid leukaemia [CML], BCR/ABL-positive
inclusion: Chronic myelogenous leukaemia: Philadelphia chromosome (Ph1) positive
Chronic myelogenous leukaemia: with crisis of blast cells
exclusion: secondary and unspecified neoplasm of lymph nodes
